item.title: Under Fire From Trump’s Tariffs, Ammo Makers in a Balkan Valley Hunker Down
item.description: Companies that make ammunition in the Bosnian city of Gorazde fear they may not survive the tariffs imposed on the goods that they send to their bigge...

item.title: Why There’s No Battlefield Solution to India’s Perpetual Pakistan Problem
item.description: This month’s violent escalation reminded the world how India’s gradual rise can be hindered by the troublesome country next door.

item.title: Trump Shrugs Off Netanyahu on Gulf Tour
item.description: On Iran, Gaza, Syria and Yemen, President Trump is moving ahead without Israel, reshaping decades of foreign policy.

item.title: How Trump’s America Is Reuniting the U.K. and E.U.
item.description: A summit on Monday between Britain and the European Union, expected to include a defense pact, may kick-start a new era.
